content.html: Random commenter: Why does CS need an ethics focus? Me: Because technology hurts people and maybe if doesn’t have to. Them: Technology is just a tool. Me: That. That is why CS people need more ethics focused training. I swear this is 100% real.
content.value:
Random commenter: Why does CS need an ethics focus?
Me: Because technology hurts people and maybe if doesn’t have to. 
Them: Technology is just a tool. 
Me: That. That is why CS people need more ethics focused training. 

I swear this is 100% real.
